name: Herbed Chicken Nuggets
author: Amy
summary: These chicken nuggets are tender and delicious! Many friends have asked for the recipe and my husband loves them!
ingredients: ½ cup dried bread crumbs, seasoned
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Spray a baking sheet with non-stick cooking spray
Trim any fat from chicken and cut into 1-inch cubes
In a bowl, beat the eggs with the water and add the chicken
Combine the parsley, thyme, red pepper, bread crumbs, wheat germ, basil and pepper
Stir in the oil with a fork and mix well to distribute evenly
Pour seasoning mixture into a resealable plastic bag and toss the chicken pieces to coat
Place coated chicken pieces on the prepared baking sheet and bake at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) for 10 minutes, turn the pieces, and bake for an additional 5 minutes
